headline: US offers largest ever energy loan with $26.5 billion to Southern Co
summary: Energy Department has offered a $26.54 billion loan to subsidiaries of Southern ‌Co to increase grid reliability, the largest ever such ‌financing by its loan office, the department said on Wednesday.

raw.headline: US offers largest ever energy loan with $26.5 billion to Southern Co
raw.summary: Energy Department has offered a $26.54 billion loan to subsidiaries of Southern ‌Co to increase grid reliability, the largest ever such ‌financing by its loan office, the department said on Wednesday.

headline: Southern Company receives historic Department of Energy $26.5 billion loan guarantees to increase grid reliability
summary: Customers across Alabama and Georgia are set to benefit from a historic U.S. government investment into energy infrastructure and grid reliability. Southern Company's subsidiaries, Georgia Power and Alabama Power, have received a loan package of up to $26.54 billion from the Department of Energy's Office of Energy Dominance Financing (EDF). Over the approximately 30-year term of the loans, customers are expected to recognize estimated savings of $7 billion.

raw.headline: Southern Company receives historic Department of Energy $26.5 billion loan guarantees to increase grid reliability

Over the approximately 30-year term of the loans, customers are expected to recognize estimated savings of $7 billion.

headline: Southern Company Q4 Earnings Disappoint as Costs Increase
summary: SO's fourth-quarter EPS of 55 cents missed estimates as higher costs weighed, even as revenues jumped 10% on strong retail sales growth.

raw.headline: Southern Company Q4 Earnings Disappoint as Costs Increase
raw.summary: SO's fourth-quarter EPS of 55 cents missed estimates as higher costs weighed, even as revenues jumped 10% on strong retail sales growth.

headline: DOE loans Southern $26.5B for 5 GW of new gas, other grid investments
summary: Calling it the largest loan in the agency’s history, DOE said it aims to deliver over $7 billion in cost savings for Georgia Power and Alabama Power customers.

raw.headline: DOE loans Southern $26.5B for 5 GW of new gas, other grid investments
raw.summary: Calling it the largest loan in the agency’s history, DOE said it aims to deliver over $7 billion in cost savings for Georgia Power and Alabama Power customers.
